main event: A letter written in 1958 described a UFO sighting of lights that appeared to be ground lights in Warrenton, Virginia, in June 1956.
interesting points: The lights were reported to be soft glowing orbs about 2 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The report indicated there were 6 or 7 objects observed., Conclusions ranged from balloon, aircraft, astronomical, to insufficient data for identification., The report came from an unreliable source due to the delay in reporting the incident.
witness description: A person who had been hitchhiking and had an interest in photography.
